data.eml:eml: Description of a new species of Gaeolaelaps (Acari: Laelapidae) from Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Saeidi, Zarir, Nemati, Alireza, Khalili-Moghadam, Arsalan (2016): Description of a new species of Gaeolaelaps (Acari: Laelapidae) from Iran. ZooKeys 612: 31-40, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.612.9678, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.612.9678
